'''''Pesma o Otruu i Itrun''''', published in [[2002]], is a bilingual (Serbian/English) edition of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poem ''[[The Lay of Aotrou and Itroun]]''. The book was printed in 500 copies, and it is the first reprint of the poem since its publication in ''[[The Welsh Review (Vol.IV, No.4)|The Welsh Review]]'' ([[1945]]).<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=31350|articlename=Welsh Review. 1945|dated=|website=TB|accessed=22 June 2013}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.unesco.org/xtrans/bsresult.aspx?lg=0&a=Tolkien&l=srp&fr=10|articlename=Index Translationum (search result for Tolkien + Serbian)|dated=|website=[http://www.unesco.org Unesco.org]|accessed=22 June 2013}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.limundo.com/kupovina/Knjige/Fantastika/Dz-R-R-TOLKIN-PESMA-O-OTRUU-I-ITRUN/11322489|articlename=Dz. R. R. TOLKIN- PESMA O OTRUU I ITRUN|dated=11 April 2013|website=[http://www.limundo.com/ Limundo.com]|accessed=22 June 2013}}</ref>

An expanded edition was published in [[2015]].
